rules_text:
Devour artifact and/or creature 2 [i](As this enters, you may sacrifice any number of artifacts and/or creatures. This creature enters with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.)[/i]
When Oakenmaul, the Apex enters, choose one for each Beast it devoured–
• Put two +1/+1 counters on Oakenmaul.
• You gain 3 life.
• Draw a card.
notes:
New card — Replaced Mana Garden

Garden feels like it wants to be in a commander precon, and I want at least one mythic to care about Beasts.
